attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think more people would recycle if their energy bills and taxes were lowered for the people who do recycle. A lot of people do not know that even PCs and Mobile phones can be recycled also. If it was more published people would be aware of the fact that almost everything can be recycled some how.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
